intro: Acinodendron stenobotryum, commonly known as the narrow-leaf acinodendron, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and trees. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its leaves are usually narrow and arranged oppositely along the stems. Acinodendron stenobotryum is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and undergrowth.
